profile:
Endri Poletti Architect Inc. is a full-service design firm focusing on residential, commercial, medical, corporate, industrial, municipal and federal facilities.

For over twenty five years we have built long term and trusted relationships with clients and industry professionals through a dedication to exceptional client service, critical thinking, and award winning results. 

We are a group of talented architects, designers, and thinkers who are driven by a passion for producing creative spaces, with functional conclusions.

Above all, we believe that architecture has the ability to augment the daily course of an individual and is something to be celebrated.

From 1996 to 2003, EPA had provided architectural services to firms in Arizona and Michigan, US. 
Now based in London, ON since 2003, we have designed a wide range of projects around Ontario.

“There is Truth and Beauty in Simplicity”.

(519) 850-9408
specialities: Residential | Industrial | Medical | Commercial | Mixed Use | Renovation | Institutional
memberships: Ontario Architects Association (OAA) | Royal Architectural Institute of Canada (RAIC)
